name: Microlab SP-FC20BK 40 W 2.1-Channel Speakers
Features: [Advanced DSP technology for high fidelity sound production, Deep bass and vocals with subwoofer and bass reflex tunnel design, Beautifully designed satellites, perfect for your living room or studies, Analog to Digital sound processing with minimum distortion and maximum precision, Powerful amplifier using state-of-the art digital processing for dynamic power, Wireless remote with RF technology for 360 degree all round use without line-of-sight limitations]
